word: Study carefully the first chapter of Hebrews. Become interested in the Scriptures. Read and study them diligently. "In them ye think ye have eternal life," Christ said, "and they are they which testify of me." It means everything to us to have an experimental and individual knowledge of God and of Jesus Christ,"whom he hath sent." "For this is life eternal, that they might know thee the only true God, and Jesus Christ, whom thou hast sent."
